definition: contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel
to attack/to inherit/classifier for suits (esp. of funeral robes)

sentences.english: We have no background of ordinary girl, how can one really counter attack?
sentences.chinese: 我们这些没有背景的普通姑娘，如何才能真正逆袭？

definition: lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
to amaze the world with a single brilliant feat (idiom); an overnight celebrity
to work hard towards a turnaround/to fight to reverse sth
lit. late-comer lives above (idiom); the up-and-coming youngster outstrips the older generation/the pupil surpasses the master
to catch up vigorously/to set off in hot pursuit
see 勢不可當|势不可当[shi4 bu4 ke3 dang1]
to rise abruptly (to a towering position)/to tower over/to spring up/to emerge suddenly/the emergence (e.g. of a power)
to advance boldly/to push ahead vigorously
lit. to upend heaven and earth (idiom)/fig. to change the course of events/to turn things around
to be in defiance of the natural order
